title: Le Salama
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a Casablanca atmosphere and covers 3 floors. Offers an extensive selection of vegetarian, gluten free and vegan dishes. From starters to main courses and dessert. Lively terrace with happy hour, Moroccan tapas, traditional Moroccan cuisine, belly dancers, shisha, DJ. Stunning 360 degree views of the medina. 1st and 2nd floor dining and chill out. Set in a stylish French Colonial setting reminiscent of the movie Casablanca. Suitable for individuals or large parties. Total capacity over 250 persons. Located just meters off Djema el Fna. Part of the Fakir Collection.
streetAddress: 40 Rue des Banque, Djema el Fna, Medina
